markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Hatchling Flight](/Feats.aspx?ID=2389) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Kobold" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=224" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 39 <sup>3.0</sup>

**Frequency**
once per round

**Prerequisites**
[Winglets](/Feats.aspx?ID=2384)

</column>

---

You can fly a little! You Fly up to half your Speed. If you don't end your movement on solid ground, you fall at the end of your turn.

<title level="2">Hatchling Flight leads to...</title>
[Wyrmling Flight](/Feats.aspx?ID=2392)
name: Hatchling Flight
